description: A Flutter widget implementation for a dashboard screen in a budget tracking app. It fetches and displays financial data such as income, expenses, categories, and monthly trends.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main dashboard page of the app.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching, UI updates, and rendering for DashboardScreen.

classes.name: _BarChart
classes.description: A stateless widget rendering a bar chart visualization of monthly income and expense data.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches dashboard data from the API and updates the state accordingly.

methods.name: _money
methods.description: Formats a number as currency with dollar sign.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the dashboard screen, including loading indicators, error messages, and data display.

methods.name: _metricCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget displaying a financial metric such as income, expense, or net.

methods.name: _monthLabel
methods.description: Returns abbreviated month name for a given month number.

methods.name: _safeDiv
methods.description: Performs safe division to avoid division by zero in chart calculations.

methods.name: _bar
methods.description: Creates a bar segment for the chart representing a value as a proportion of the max.
